name: JetSilphymon
effect: When one of your Digimon with a Tamer card in its digivolution cards digivolves into this card in your hand, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 2. [When Digivolving] If a card with [Hybrid] in its traits is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)
